name: wordpress responsive scroller
author: aumsrini

sections.description:
A Simple WordPress plugin which is used to scroll news in responsive mode. To display any where in post or pages use this short code [wpr_scroller]

For use in template <?php wpr_func($atts) ; ?>

Features

  • Responsive
  • Work with all browsers
  • Set Number of news to scroll
  • Add unlimited news category
  • Add unlimited news

sections.installation:
1. Upload wpr-scroller.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Shortcode to display news scroller in post are pages [wpr_scroller]
  4. Place <?php wpr_func($atts) ; ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
How to add news in admin ?

After activate the plugin,then go to dashboard left menu there is a menu named Scroller news

Is there category option for news ?

yes, in Scroller news==>submenu news Category option added.

Is there any settings for display scrolling news ?

yes, in dashboard settings==> WPR Scoller settings available to set no.of news to show.
